md:
giải nghĩa từ "actress" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

**Actress** (noun)

* Meaning: A woman who performs in a play, movie, or television show.
* Vietnamese: Nữ diễn viên

Example sentence: "She's a talented actress who has won many awards for her performances."

Related words:

* Actor (noun): A person who performs in a play, movie, or television show. (Nam diễn viên)
* Performance (noun): An act of performing in a play, movie, or television show. (Buổi diễn)
* Theater (noun): A building or space where plays, movies, or television shows are performed. (Nhà hát)
* Film (noun): A movie or a video recording. (Bộ phim)
* Television (noun): A device that shows moving images and sounds. (Truyền hình)
html:
giải nghĩa từ "actress" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

Actress (noun)

  • Meaning: A woman who performs in a play, movie, or television show.
  • Vietnamese: Nữ diễn viên

Example sentence: "She's a talented actress who has won many awards for her performances."

Related words:

  • Actor (noun): A person who performs in a play, movie, or television show. (Nam diễn viên)
  • Performance (noun): An act of performing in a play, movie, or television show. (Buổi diễn)
  • Theater (noun): A building or space where plays, movies, or television shows are performed. (Nhà hát)
  • Film (noun): A movie or a video recording. (Bộ phim)
  • Television (noun): A device that shows moving images and sounds. (Truyền hình)
